home.description: This is a demonstration of React localization using i18next. Explore the blog posts and switch between languages to see the localization in action.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Hello! I'm a passionate developer who loves sharing knowledge and experiences through writing. This blog serves as a platform to discuss various topics including technology, development practices, and personal insights.
about.contactDescription: Feel free to reach out if you'd like to connect or discuss any of the topics covered in this blog.
